title: Police Log: Sept. 5, 2015
content:
Sept. 5 

Brandon A. Archuleta, 25, of Elko was arrested at 440 Grant St. for resisting a public official. Bail: $1,140 

------ 

Karl G. Armstrong, 52, of Elko was arrested on Eagleview Drive for drawing a deadly weapon in a threatening manner, three counts of discharging a gun in or on a public thoroughfare or interstate, and on a mental health hold. Bail: $5,911 

  ------ 

Carlos F. Castro-Benitez, 28, of Deeth was arrested at the intersection of Fifth Street and Wilson Avenue for DUI and headlamps not illuminated when required. Bail: $1,255  

------ 

Javier Hernandez, 40, of Elko was arrested at the intersection of Eighth and Juniper streets for driving without a driver's license and stopping, standing or parking vehicle on highway. Bail: $230  

------ 

Anthony W. Hunt, 34, of Battle Mountain was arrested at Mary's Wash in Carlin for DUI and failure to give appropriate signal when required. Bail: $1,515 

------ 

Gary L. Jones Jr., 42, of Owhyee was arrested at the Elko County Jail for failure to appear after a misdemeanor crime. No bail listed.   

------ 

Augustus E. Kelley, 26, of Spring Creek was arrested at the intersection of Idaho Street and College Avenue for speeding, failure to wear safety belt or shoulder harness, third-offense DUI, use or possession of drug paraphernalia and possession of less than one ounce of marijuana. Bail: $21,594 

------ 

Andrew T. Malone, 25, of Elko was arrested at 548 Commercial St. for giving false statement to or obstructing a public official, resisting a public official, and on a mental health hold. Bail: $2,274  

------ 

Rae Miller, 25, of Spokane Valley, Washington, was arrested at the intersection of Idaho and Oak streets for DUI and speeding. Bail: $1,335 
 
------ 

Jose J. Miramontes, 38, of Emmett, Idaho, was arrested at 1385 U.S. Highway 93 in Jackpot for domestic battery and coercion. Bail: $8,137 

------ 

Arthur L. Steelman III, 24, of Elko was arrested at 2001 Errecart Blvd. for trespassing. Bail: $192 

------ 

Thomas F. Stevenson, 55, of Kearns, Utah, was arrested at 2065 Idaho St. for contempt of court. Bail: $517 

------ 

Ashley D. Stone, 19, of Spring Creek was arrested at 282 Spring Creek Parkway for petit larceny. Bail: $1,137 

------ 

Johnny J. White, 57, of Kearns, Utah, was arrested at the intersection of State Route 278 and Chestnut Street for DUI and failure to drive properly on divided road. Bail: $1,445
